name: LD37: Jack Burgtun & the Chinese hell of sick little children stuck in one room
name_original: LD37: Jack Burgtun & the Chinese hell of sick little children stuck in one room
description:
Jack Burgtun, after once again facing off with the devilish evil Chinese magician, finds himself trap in one of them many Chinese hells (no, not that one, not the other one either, but the OTHER, other one).

It's up to you to save his soul through this short, silly "typing" adventure game.

SPOILERS

  • Do the horse
  • Do the donkey
  • Do the plane
  • Do the bird
  • Do the cat
  • Do the dog

Don't ask...
